sense.gloss: to account for, to make up, to take up
occupying, having (an area) all to oneself
to tell someone's fortune, to forecast, to predict, to divine
hogging, having all to oneself, monopolising, monopolizing

r_ele.r: しじょうせんゆうりつ

sense.gloss: euagaric fungus (in grocery stores, usu. refers to cultivated field mushrooms, etc.)
to occupy, to hold, to command, to account for
I've got it!, I've done it!, that's it!, bingo!
possessiveness, desire to monopolize (monopolise), desire for control
unlawful detention (of shipping), unlawful occupation (of a house or land)
slip of paper with a fortune-telling message, street fortune-teller
determining a speaker's true or hidden meaning, determining a speaker's intentions from his manner of speech
divining good or bad luck from listening to someone

sdata.j: ↑化学↑↓かがく↓↑製品↑↓せいひん↓が↑当社↑↓とうしゃ↓の↑輸出↑↓ゆしゅつ↓↑品↑↓ひん↓のおよそ↑３↑↓さん↓↑分↑↓ぶん↓の↑２↑↓に↓を↑占↑↓し↓めます。
sdata.e: Chemical products account for approximately two-thirds of our exports.

sdata.j: マーテイン・ルーサー・キング・ジュニアが↑後↑↓のち↓に↑占↑↓し↓めることになる↑歴史↑↓れきし↓↑上↑↓じょう↓の↑地位↑↓ちい↓を↑予測↑↓よそく↓できたものは、↑当時↑↓とうじ↓↑誰↑↓だれ↓↑一↑↓いち↓↑人↑↓にん↓としていなかった。
sdata.e: Nobody could have guessed, in those days, the place in history that Martin Luther King, Jr. was to have.

sdata.j: トランプ↑占↑↓うらな↓いをしてあげましょう。

sdata.e: The city was taken by the English in 1664.

sdata.j: しかし、アメリカ↑同様↑↓どうよう↓↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓も↑中流↑↓ちゅうりゅう↓↑階級↑↓かいきゅう↓の↑平均↑↓へいきん↓↑的↑↓てき↓↑収入↑↓しゅうにゅう↓の↑人々↑↓ひとびと↓が↑圧倒的↑↓あっとうてき↓↑多数↑↓たすう↓を↑占↑↓し↓める↑国↑↓くに↓なので、↑妻↑↓つま↓たちはメイドを↑雇↑↓やと↓わず、↑自分↑↓じぶん↓で↑何↑↓なに↓もかもに↑励↑↓はげ↓む。

sdata.j: ↑今↑↓いま↓の↑傾向↑↓けいこう↓が↑続↑↓つづ↓くと、↑今後↑↓こんご↓３０↑年↑↓ねん↓↑以内↑↓いない↓に６５↑歳↑↓さい↓↑以上↑↓いじょう↓の↑人↑↓ひと↓が↑人口↑↓じんこう↓の４↑分↑↓ぶん↓の１を↑占↑↓し↓めることになる。
